game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 밤에 잠재의식 깊은 곳에서 강력한 아티팩트 찾아 악몽을 정복하세요. 낮에 레드 헤이븐을 탐험하고 친구들을 통해 꿈의 힘을 해방하세요. 꿈꾸어라. 죽어라. 깨어나라. 다시 잠들라.
game.shortDescriptionEn: By night, delve deep into your subconscious and discover powerful artifacts to conquer your nightmares. By day, explore the city of Redhaven and build relationships to unlock the power of your dreams. DREAM. DIE. WAKE. REPEAT.
